metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4076 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw exists in tang, a network-based cryptographic binding server, whichcould result in leak of private keys.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tang - 14-2
tang-common - 14-2
tang-xinetd - 14-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tang package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '14-2').
